org.ensor.math.geometry

Class Vector2

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ensor.math.geometry.Vector2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHasX, IHasY, INorm, IVector<Vector2>, IVectorWithNorm<Vector2>

    public class Vector2
extends Object
implements IHasX, IHasY, IVectorWithNorm<Vector2>
    This method represents an element of a 2-dimensional vector space .
    Author:
    jona
